item.title: Getting started with asp.net-mvc-4
item.description: What are new features in MVC 4? Why to use MVC 4? # The fourth version of the framework focuses mainly on making mobile web application development easier. New features in AP.NET MVC 4 ASP.NET Web API ASP.NET Web API is a framework that makes it easy to build HTTP services that reach a broad range of clients, including browsers and mobile devices. HTTP is not just for serving up web pages.
